examples: The sunflower turned its face towards the sun.
His face wore a puzzled look.
Two faces appeared at our window.
After the surgery, his face was as white as a sheet.
After the car accident, her face was as white as a ghost.
words.defineEn: the front part of our head, that is the place our eyes, lips, and nose are
words.defineVi: phần trước của đầu chúng ta, đó là nơi có mắt, môi và mũi

examples: He earned his money by the sweat of his brow.
I got a comfortable lifestyle by the sweat of my brow - I owe it to nobody but myself!
Only mono-brow, cannot drive certain vehicles.
- Is mine drooping on my brow?
my brows have never really been that different.
words.defineEn: the part in someone's face that is below the hair and above the eyes
words.defineVi: phần trên khuôn mặt của ai đó ở dưới tóc và trên mắt

examples: The tears ran down her cheeks.
She pressed her cheek against the cool glass window.
The baby had chubby cheeks and a cute face.
He planted a gentle kiss on her cheek.
Neither nation is renowned for turning the other cheek.
words.defineEn: any of the two soft sides of our face that are bellow our eyes
words.defineVi: bất kỳ hai mặt mềm mại nào trên khuôn mặt của chúng ta dưới mắt chúng ta

examples: She smiled, her cheeks dimpling with joy.
They make dimples on the surface.
Your mass is creating a dimple in spacetime right now!
This button over here it's just a nice little dimple for the power button and a really premium looking and feeling joystick.
Rather than gravity being a special force between two bodies, massive things warp spacetime, like dimples in a fabric, and falling objects are simply moving in straight lines around these curves.
words.defineEn: a small hollow place in the flesh, especially one that forms in the cheeks when one smiles
words.defineVi: một chỗ rỗng nhỏ trong thịt, đặc biệt là một chỗ hình thành ở má khi một người cười

examples: He gently rested his chin on her shoulder.
The company took it on the chin as a symbol of the system in the Sixties.
She wore a chin strap to protect her jaw during sports activities.
She rested her chin on her hand, listening attentively to the conversation.
He scratched his chin, trying to recall the answer to the question.
words.defineEn: the lowest part of our face that is below our mouth
words.defineVi: phần thấp nhất của khuôn mặt của chúng tôi là dưới miệng của chúng tôi

examples: Her irreverent chatter during the ceremony raised many people's eyebrows.
My best friend's pink hair definitely raised a few eyebrows at our very strict school.
He raised his eyebrows in surprise when he heard the unexpected news.
She used a small brush to comb her eyebrows into shape.
I'm well aware that statement will raise eyebrows.
words.defineEn: one of the two lines of hair that grow above our eyes
words.defineVi: một trong hai dòng tóc mọc phía trên mắt của chúng ta

examples: He reached out a hand and touched her forehead.
I try to give people the benefit of the doubt and assume the best in them, as everyone's faults are not written in their forehead.
Forehead reaching toward the earth, palms up.
My last tennis match took place on Link's forehead.
He had a forehead vein.
words.defineEn: the part of the face above the eyebrows and below the hair
words.defineVi: một phần của khuôn mặt trên lông mày và dưới tóc

words.defineEn: a long thin jaw with a large chin
words.defineVi: hàm dài mỏng với cằm lớn

examples: Rumors never passed her lips.
Not a drop of liquor has passed my lips.
Read my lips.
Read my lips.
My lips are sealed.
words.defineEn: each of the two body parts that are soft and surround our mouth
words.defineVi: mỗi bộ phận trong số hai bộ phận cơ thể mềm và bao quanh miệng của chúng ta

examples: The exceptional taste of Temple oranges makes them a prized ingredient in gourmet recipes.
As midnight approaches, Buddhist temples around the country begin ringing out the old year.
He applied a few drops of spikenard oil to his temples, finding relief from his headache.
Unlike regular oranges, Temple oranges have a distinct floral note that enhances their sweet and tangy flavor.
In the holy city of Varanasi, temples draw throngs of believers, who float oil lamps and marigolds.
words.defineEn: one of the two flat areas between the eyes and the ears
words.defineVi: một trong hai vùng phẳng giữa mắt và tai

examples: It really gets up my nose.
She wrinkled her nose at the taste of broccoli.
She wrinkled her nose at the strong smell.
He had a nose for trouble and a brilliant tactical mind.
She has a good nose for a bargain.
words.defineEn: the body part that is in the middle of our face and we use to smell and breathe
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể ở giữa khuôn mặt của chúng tôi và chúng tôi sử dụng để ngửi và thở

examples: The mother gently cleaned her baby's ears with a cotton swab.
Her advice fell on deaf ears.
Her pleas for mercy fell on deaf ears.
Dr. Jaffe pinned her ears back.
The factory owners turned a deaf ear to the demands of the workers.
words.defineEn: each of the two body parts that we use for hearing
words.defineVi: mỗi bộ phận trong số hai bộ phận cơ thể mà chúng ta sử dụng để nghe

examples: My father has brown eyes.
The woman has eyes like a hawk!
A vase on a side table caught his eye.
The actor's intense bedroom eyes added an extra layer of allure to his performance.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: a body part on our face that we have two of and use for seeing
words.defineVi: một bộ phận cơ thể trên khuôn mặt của chúng ta mà chúng ta có hai và sử dụng để nhìn

examples: Watch your mouth!
My mouth felt completely dry.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
The smell of the burgers on the grill made Jake's mouth water.
People held handkerchiefs over their mouths.
words.defineEn: the externally visible part of the oral cavity on the face and the system of organs surrounding the opening
words.defineVi: phần có thể nhìn thấy bên ngoài của khoang miệng trên khuôn mặt và hệ thống các cơ quan xung quanh lỗ mở
